name: Imagine Tommorow
description:
1 bit gamejam submission.

To play this game you'll need a manual. You can download it below. It's highly recommended to play the game in small window near PDF reader with manual.

Online manual available here

UPDATE
Thanks for the feedback! From what you write it looks that morse-blocks provide incomplete dialogue codes. I will try to fix the error whenever I had a moment to sit down to code.

I started working on it 15 hours before the end of the jam so if you find problems with the dialogue or text, please let me know in the comments.

Have fun! :)
